INDES.IS.long_name: Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri Mühendislik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
INDES.IS.summary: Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri MÃ¼hendislik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi, through its subsidiaries, distributes information technology products in Turkey. The company's product portfolio includes PC, notebook, server, peripherals, software, and OEM products; and CPU, hard disks, mother boards, VGA cards, monitors, optical products, memory products, laser printers, and backup hardware products, as well as security products. It also offers consumables, moveable data storage media, accessories, and papers; and corporate network systems, structural network components, cable products, corporate telephone systems, and network security and ADSL communication solutions, as well as logistics and transportation services. The company distributes its products through a network of system integrators, value added dealers, and regular dealers, as well as retail channels, including retail chain, regular computer stores, and e-retail. Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri MÃ¼hendislik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
